name: Up to Eleven
description:
A small project, loosely based on the 15-puzzle. I took the old concept and made things a little more complicated.

Test your logic in a single mode  and challenge your friends in a good
old hotseat 2-players mode.  Try the new trial mode (ver. 1.00 update)
and share your solved puzzles and results.

Feel free to download and leave feedback.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music: Gnossienne No. 2 by Erik Satie (performed by flutist / distributed by audiojungle)

Developed by Dmitry Latash

The web version is here

Contact me via twitter @Play_UptoEleven
